channel.title: PI pet system
channel.description: I have added working pets, they are following etc. but i cant pick them up and when i try to i get an exeption. Do anyone knows how can i do it? I know that i have to do it in ActionAssistant but im not sure about the code. Will give some more information when ill be at home.

item.title: PI pet system
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I know this bug. The issue is when you drop it it doesn’t save your player ID as the pet owner. You need to use the ‘interact’ option on the pet before you can pick it up. So surround what’s throwing the error with a try-catch and in the catch put something like c.sendMessage(“Please interact with your pet before picking it up.”);

Read full topic
